name: Mugtails: Hedgehog (small)
description:
These whimsical white matte finished cups feature a range of Woodland animals. Each animal strikes two different poses, one on each side, whilst each creatures unique tail forms the handle! Use as a mug, or, put a tea light inside the delicate porcelain and the light will glow through. The sizes range through small, medium & large relative to each critters size. 

Dishwasher & microwave safe.

130ml, 5cm high

*note: these cups have an unglazed exterior so substances such as lipstick may adhere/stain -- wash immediately after use.

name: Mugtail: Fawn, Rabbit, Squirrel, Cat & Fox (Medium)
description:
These whimsical white matte finished cups feature a range of Woodland animals. Each animal strikes two different poses, one on each side, whilst each creatures unique tail forms the handle! Use as a mug, or, put a tea light inside the delicate porcelain and the light will glow through. The sizes range through small, medium & large relative to each critters size. 

Dishwasher & microwave safe.

Dimensions and volume for each animal as follows: 
Squirrel 150ml,  7cm high
Rabbit 280ml, 7.5cm high
Fawn 330ml, 9.4cm high
Cat 270ml, 9.4cm high
Fox 280ml, 10cm high

*note: these cups have an unglazed exterior so substances such as lipstick may adhere/stain -- wash immediately after use.

name: Mugtail: Moose & Bear (Large)
description:
These whimsical white matte finished cups feature a range of Woodland animals. Each animal strikes two different poses, one on each side, whilst each creatures unique tail forms the handle! Use as a mug, or, put a tea light inside the delicate porcelain and the light will glow through. The sizes range through small, medium & large relative to each critters size. 

Dishwasher & microwave safe.

Dimensions & volume as follows:
Moose 530ml, 11cm high
Bear 460ml, 8.5cm high

*note: these cups have an unglazed exterior so substances such as lipstick may adhere/stain -- wash immediately after use.

name: Mokkatanten Cups
description:
These unique and beautifully designed white porcelain cups are handmade in Berlin. Instead of handles they come with insulated finger-spacers! Two sizes are available:

'Einzueins' height 50mm, diameter 58mm, 1 spacer - perfect for espresso drinkers!

'Einszudrei' height 85mm, diameter 58mm, 3 spacers/1 spacer

Limited Stock.

name: Number Cups
description:
Designed by graphic designer Takuya Hoshiko and made in Japan. These minimalist white cups come with your choice of numbered handle from 0 – 9. The design is playful yet practical making these cups make the perfect gift for birthdays, anniversaries, etc. Each cup comes individually boxed.

Colour: White 
Size: H 100mm x W 70mm

name: Petit Boards: Paris, NYC, London, Berlin & Amsterdam
description:
Designed & made in Germany these breakfast boards have a multitude of uses around the home or workplace, perfect for enjoying your daily croissant & coffee while you dream of being someplace else. Your choice of: Paris, NYC, London, Amsterdam or Berlin.

On a practical note: the boards are heat-resistant up to 150°C, comply with food hygiene guidelines and are impervious to abrasion and acids; and while resistant to cutting, sharp or serrated knives will leave marks.

Size: 23.5 cm x 14.3 cm

name: Fringe Studio Glass Frames
description: Beaded glass frames with printed borders, bevelled glass pieces & finished with an antiqued, copper beaded edge. Easel back. Frames are packaged in a chocolate brown gift box. Two sizes: 4 x 6 inches or 5 x 7 inches.

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau Alice Cushion Cover
description:
Several incarnations of 'Alice' are currently available. First she comes silkscreened on a Liberty of London cotton in either a green/blue-toned OR a pink-toned floral. OR on a crisp white cotton. All variations see 'Alice' showered in La Cerise's signature fluorescent pink confetti. 

Front: 100% cotton. Back: 100% linen closed with two pearly buttons.

50 x 50 cm.

COVER ONLY (excludes insert).

(Photos courtesy of Coco Amardell & La Cerise Sur Le Gateau).

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau 'Jean-Loup' Cushion Cover
description:
This crisp white cotton cushion cover features the devilishly handsome ‘Jean-Loup’. Jean is embroidered in black and wears a dashing red & white checked vest, and carries a basket of cherries.

Front: 100% cotton. Back: 100% silver-toned natural linen closed with two pearly buttons.

Dry Clean Only.

50 x 50 cm. COVER ONLY (excludes insert).

(Photos courtesy of Coco Amardell & La Cerise Sur Le Gateau).

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau 'Marcel' or 'Gertrude' Cushion Cover
description:
These cushion covers each feature a circus animal silkscreened in navy/charcoal on a cream background with large spots: ‘'Marcel' the lion has teal blue spots & 'Gertrude' the seal, lilac. Each has a sprinkling La Cerise's signature fluorescent pink confetti. 'Simone' (elephant) is sold out.

Sadly this is the last of this range, so act now if you would like one!
 
Front: 100% cotton. Back: 100% silver-toned natural linen closed with two pearly buttons.

Dry Clean Only.

COVER ONLY 50 x 50 cm.

(Photos courtesy of Coco Amardell & La Cerise Sur Le Gateau).

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau 'Marthe' Cushion Cover
description:
Meet Marthe. She likes Hopscotch & is new to the range this season.

Front: 100% cotton. Back: 100% linen closed with two pearly buttons.

50 x 50 cm.

COVER ONLY (excludes insert).

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau 'Eiffel Tower' Cushion Cover
description:
This vintage-inspired cushion has the iconic Eiffel Tower sitting inside a snow dome screen printed in black against a background of giant pink or celeste polkadots. 

COVER ONLY (excludes insert).
50 x 50cm
Front: 100% cotton.  Back: 100% linen closed with two pearly buttons.
Dry clean only.  Iron on reverse side

(Photos courtesy of La Cerise Sur Le Gateau).

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau 'Clogs' in Celeste or Black Polkadots
description:
This rectangular cushion is available in two colour ways and features a pair of dainty ankles in cute Mary-janes printed on a background of giant spots.

Available: Black polkadots with pink shoes OR Celeste polkadots with black shoes.

Front: 100% cotton. Back: 100% linen closed with two pearly buttons.

30cm x 50cm 

Due to the unusual size of these cushions insert is included. Inserts come vacuum packed so are easy to post.

(Photos courtesy of La Cerise Sur Le Gateau).

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau 'Bambi' Cushion
description:
Two lovely deers adorn this cushion. Silkscreened in charcoal/navy on a grey floral liberty print & surrounded by flour pink stars.

Front: 100% cotton. Back: 100% linen closed with two pearly buttons.

30cm x 50cm 

Due to the unusual size of these cushions insert is included. Inserts come vacuum packed so are easy to post.

(Photo courtesy of La Cerise Sur Le Gateau).

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau END OF LINE Cushion Covers
description:
With new designs arriving we have a few oddments left that we're putting out at a bargain price. Rarely do we ever reduce La Cerise Sur Le Gateau cushions so be quick these won't last long!

HAVE A SEAT: This over-sized cushion features a hot pink chair silkscreened atop a background of giant black spots with the words 'have a seat' embroidered (in pink) vertically along the left hand side of the cover. COVER ONLY (excludes insert). 72cm x 72cm (pic 1)

BOOTS: A super cool pair of neon pink Cowboy boots are printed against a background of giant black polkadots. COVER ONLY (excludes insert). 50cm x 50cm (pic 2)

Front: 100% cotton. Back: 100% linen.

Dry clean only. Iron on reverse side.

(Photos courtesy of Coco Amardell & La Cerise Sur Le Gateau)

options.name: 'Have a Seat' Cover (72 x 72) Black Dots

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau Silkscreened Tea Towels (white cotton)
description:
Parisian designer Anne Hubert's range of customized tea towels fuse tradition and function with distinctive design and feature a range of vintage, iconic & romantic images. At present 5 designs are available:

EIFFEL TOWER: This vintage-inspired tea towel has the iconic Eiffel Tower printed in black & sitting inside a snow dome showered in hot pink confetti.

PISTOL: This uber-chic tea towel features a Western-style pistol printed in teal and showered in pink confetti spots—perfect for anyone who needs some ‘encouragement’ to dry the dishes.

BRIDE: This vintage-inspired tea towel features ‘Gedeon and Marthe’—our happy couple! Showered in La Cerise’s trademark pink confetti spots, their sugar-spun (or acrylic-molded) figures clasp hands and enjoy a moment of joy, fear and gluttony—and now, image immortalized on a tea towel—practicality!

La Cerise’s 100 % cotton tea towels are screen printed by hand. Each one has a woven 1cm wide (red) vertical stripe on either side that runs the length of the tea towel. 80 x 50 cm

Designed in France. Printed in Portugal.
Machine wash regular cycle at 40°C. Cool iron on the reverse side.

(Photos courtesy of La Cerise Sur Le Gateau).

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau Tea Towels (Grey/Taupe Cotton)
description:
Parisian designer Anne Hubert's range of customized tea towels fuse tradition and function with distinctive design and feature a range of vintage, iconic & romantic images. Four designs are available on a grey/taupe background.

STAR BOOTS: A super cool pair of red Cowboy boots are printed on a grey/taupe background, and like a fireworks display flouro pink stars shoot out from the tops of the boots.

SCRABBLE: This tea towel is the perfect gift for that Scrabble-loving Francophile in your life. The letter tiles sit on a grey/taupe background showered in La Cerise's signature hot pink confetti. Ohlala! (seriously, that's one of the words).

OH LA LA!: This classic phrase is printed in hot pink caps against the grey/taupe cotton with pink side stripes and garden green confetti.

J'ADORE TA MOUSTACHE: Printed in black caps against the grey/taupe cotton with pink side stripes and pink confetti.

La Cerise’s 100 % cotton tea towels are screen printed by hand. Each one has a woven 1cm wide (pink) vertical stripe on either side that runs the length of the tea towel. 80 x 50 cm

Designed in France. Made in Portugal.

Machine wash regular cycle at 40°C. Cool iron on the reverse side.

(Photos courtesy of Coco Amardell & La Cerise Sur Le Gateau)

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau END OF LINE
description:
Parisian designer Anne Hubert's range of customized tea towels fuse tradition and function with distinctive design and feature a range of vintage, iconic & romantic images. These designs are end of line so quantities are limited.

PLAY: a pair of manicured hands with red nails hold a playing card - the black cat - laid out next to her are the rest of her cards. 

DRINK: A pair of manicured hands with red nails hold a cocktail glass and for a surreal touch a goldfish swims in the glass.

All designs are printed on a white background showered in La Cerise's signature confetti.

La Cerise’s 100 % cotton tea towels are screen printed by hand. Each one has a woven 1cm wide (red or grey) vertical stripe on either side that runs the length of the tea towel. 80 x 50 cm.

Designed in France. Made in Portugal.

Machine wash regular cycle at 40°C. Cool iron on the reverse side.

(Photos courtesy of La Cerise Sur Le Gateau).

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau 'Spots' Tea Towel (Pink, Yellow or Celeste)
description: Oversized spots in adorn these white cotton tea towels. Choose from hot pink, neon yellow or celeste blue.

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau 'Toile de Jouy' Range (Tea Towel, Apron, Table Runner)
description:
In La Cerise's inimitable style - a contemporary take on traditional toile. This fabric is available in either a rich charcoal grey or neon pink silkscreened design on white cotton. The design includes many of La Cerise's iconic images.

A variety of products have been produced in this print: 

Apron: Pink (pic 3)
Table Runner: Grey or Pink (37cm x 130cm) (pic 4)
Tea Towel: Grey or Pink (pics 1 & 2)
Placemats: Grey 

(Photo courtesy of La Cerise Sur Le Gateau)

name: Garnier-Theibaut Tea Towels
description:
Garnier-Thiebaut have been designing and manufacturing quality linens since 1830. Their 100% cotton tea towels come in a variety of stunning designs. Only 3 designs currently available online: Eiffel Tower, Christmas Cracker & Bird Garden.

56 x 77cm. Designed and Made in France.

name: Catstudio Tea Towels, USA: East Coast
description:
Catstudio is a California-based company who produce these thoughtfully designed, geography-inspired tea towels. Each design is silk screened, then framed with a hand-embroidered border on a 100% cotton tea towel. Three stripes run the length of both sides with hand dyed rick rack at the top and bottom. Beautifully presented in a re-usable pouch organdy. Machine washable. Original Copyrighted Art by Catstudio.

Currently available in the 'East Coast' range are:
NEW YORK CITY: This design celebrates the diversity of New York City. Many sites & neighborhoods of the great metropolis feature including among others: Central Park, The Statue of Liberty, Harlem, East Village, Nolita, Tribeca & Soho.
BROOKLYN:The City of Brooklyn is one of New York City’s 5 Boroughs. From John Travolta in Saturday Night Fever to local landmarks The Brooklyn Bridge & Coney Island to the hip neighborhoods of Williamsburg, Dumbo & Red Hook ... just some of the highlights of this beautifully illustrated tea towel. The perfect gift for that hipster in your life.
MASSACHUSETTS: From the island of Nantucket, to the mountains of the Berkshires, the big city of Boston, the beaches of Cape Cod, the historical towns of Lexington & Concord, the historic Shaker Village at Stockbridge, the prestige of Harvard University … Massachusetts has it all. 
WASHINGTON DC: A donkey & an elephant preside over this illustrated representation of the US capital. Many famous landmarks are represented including: The Smithsonean, The Mall, The Pentagon and, of course, The White House.

name: Catstudio Tea Towels: Europe
description:
Catstudio is a California-based company who produce these thoughtfully designed, geography-inspired tea towels. Each design is silk screened, then framed with a hand-embroidered border on a 100% cotton tea towel. Three stripes run the length of both sides with hand dyed rick rack at the top and bottom. Beautifully presented in a re-usable organza pouch. Machine washable. Original Copyrighted Art by Catstudio.

Currently available in the 'Europe' range are:
ITALY: La Dolce Vita. Relive your memories of Italy from the ruins of Rome, the fashions of Milan, the Giro d'Italia & the always smoking Mt Etna.
PARIS: Ooh La La. Plenty of Paris's finest depicted here: from the Louvre, the Marais, the Champs-Élysées, Blv Saint Germain, the list is endless ...
FRANCE: From the bustle of Paris, the sunshine of Provence, the ports Marseille, the sparkle of Champagne & back again.
LONDON: This Limited Edition version of Catstudio's London tea towel was created for the Queens Diamond Jubilee. Featuring many of London's famous landmarks and limited to 600 worldwide. SOLD OUT
TRANSLYVANIA: Technically in Eastern Europe this Transylvania tea towel celebrates its most famous resident, one Count Dracula, though a fictional character the Count is thought to have been based upon the historical figure known as Vlad the Impaler! Some genuine landmarks can be found amongst the gothic horror.

name: Catstudio Tea Towels, USA: West Coast
description:
Catstudio is a California-based company who produce these thoughtfully designed, geography-inspired tea towels. Each design is silk screened, then framed with a hand-embroidered border on a 100% cotton tea towel. Three stripes run the length of both sides with hand dyed rick rack at the top and bottom. Beautifully presented in a re-usable organza pouch. Machine washable. Original Copyrighted Art by Catstudio.

Currently available in the 'West Coast' range are:
NAPA VALLEY: Celebrating California's wine country this is the perfect gift for sommelier in your life!
CALIFORNIA: Celebrating the great state of California in all its diversity from the Redwood forests of the north, the wilds of Yosemite, the picturesque coast & the great cities of LA, San Francisco & San Diego.
LOS ANGELES:  Highlighting sunny LA's best attractions, from Malibu to Long Beach and back to Beverly Hills.
HOLLYWOOD: With the iconic Hollywood sign across the top this tea towel  is the perfect stage for many of  tinsel towns best loved sites from Hollywood Boulevard & Melrose Drive to Paramount Studios & the Hollywood Bowl. 

(Photos 2-5 courtesy of Catstudio).

name: Catstudio 'Paris' Apron
description:
Plenty of Paris's finest are depicted on this lovely cotton apron: from the Louvre, the Marais, the Champs-Élysées, Blv Saint Germain, the list is endless ... Ooh La La.

100% hand-loomed cotton with red mini-floral print used for the neck/waist ties, the trim on two front pockets and the frilled hem.

name: Erica Weiner 'Baby Ring' Necklace (silver)
description:
In the Victorian era babies were adorned with fine, gem-studded rings just like adults. One of these precious itty-bitty rings has been hand-cast by Erica Weiner and made into a beautiful necklace, perfect for an expectant or new mum, or anyone you call 'baby'! Sterling silver. 

Handmade in NYC.

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Erica Weiner 'Bee' Necklace
description:
A symmetrical brass bee is suspended by the tips of its wings from two lengths of brass chain. Bee is surprisingly detailed and lightweight, and measures 6cm wide and 4cm tall. Total necklace length, including charm, is about 48cm. Brass spring ring at back.

Handmade in NYC.

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Erica Weiner 'Handcuff Lariat'
description:
Two 3/4" (2cm) detailed handcuff charms dangle at the ends of a 22" (55cm) long chain. One handcuff hangs from a chain end that has been threaded through the other handcuff so the wearer can adjust the necklace length and style. This wildly popular necklace may be Erica Weiner’s all-time best-sellers. Available in Brass, Silver Plate or Gold Plate.

*note there is no individual photo of the gold (upper of main pic)

Handmade in New York City.

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Erica Weiner 'Giant Feather' Necklace
description:
This brass pendant is dramatically big - it measures 9cm long from top to bottom. Three downward-facing chevrons decorate the center of the stylized feather. The pointy spine of the feather has been carefully bent into a circle and through it we've threaded a 66cm length of oxidized brass chain. Brass spring ring clasp and tiny "Erica Weiner" stamped tag at back.

Handmade in NYC

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Erica Weiner 'Heartbeats' Necklace
description:
Memorable, quote-able song lyrics are stamped onto a 3/4" (1.8cm) wide heart charm and plated with blingy, glossy 14K gold. Chains are short-ish—about 16" (41cm) —which makes these necklaces perfect for layering with medium-length and longer chains.

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Keystone Necklace
description: A dead stock vintage piece, this copper necklace has a gorgeously rich, ombre patina while still retaining some light-catching wattage. The chunky fern chain comes to a subtle, Art Deco-esque gold-tone point about eight inches from the clasp, making the necklace's total length about 16" (40cm).

name: Erica Weiner 'NY Transit Token' Necklaces
description:
Before Metrocards you needed to buy tokens to use the NYC subway. They were finally phased out in 2003. Grab a piece of New York City history with one of these transit token necklaces. This 7/8" (2cm) wide coin hangs from a 26" (66cm) brass chain. MTA Approved!

Handmade in New York City by Erica Weiner.

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Erica Weiner 'Xanadu' Necklace
description:
Made from architectural, Art Deco-inspired vintage collars and plated in luminous silver this necklace creates a blinding statement. The chunky herringbone chain is a little under 18" in diameter. Pair with a black turtleneck and go eighties-gallerina, or with lots of beige and chiffon scarves for a Xanadu effect.

Handmade in New York City by Erica Weiner.

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Erica Weiner 'Winged Migration' Necklace
description:
This was one of the first necklaces Erica designed, and it remains one of EWJ’s all-time best-sellers. A detailed airplane charm is suspended from a delicate 16" (41cm) chain. Airplane measures 1.5" (4cm) long and 1" (2.5cm) tall. A tiny brass sparrow flies about 3" (7.5cm) up the chain behind the airplane charm, mirroring the shape of the flying machine. Both fly (migrate) in the same direction. The airplane hangs just below the collarbone and the bird nestles into the hollow of the clavicle. Spring ring clasp at back.
The brass version will acquire a nice darkened patina over time, and the silver and gold-plated versions will stay nice and shiny into the future.   

Handmade in New York City by Erica Weiner.  

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Erica Weiner 'Arrow' Hoops
description:
These 3-inch-long brass arrow charms have been folder into gently curving half-circles and are one of those wear-it-many-ways designs: do you want the arrowhead or the fletching facing out? Maybe you want to wear one each way. With the earwires, the total circumference of each earring is about 4 1/2 inches (10cm). The brass charms will oxidize beautifully and unpredictably over time.

Handmade in New York City by Erica Weiner.

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Erica Weiner 'Ginkgo' Earrings
description:
These modern, minimal little ginkgo leaves come from Japan and are available in either brass or silver. They're made of fine mesh and feature embossed geometric leaf markings. A delicate frame surrounds each 1 1/4" (3cm) leaf. Brass ear wires are plated in sterling silver or 14kt gold respectively.

Handmade in New York City by Erica Weiner.

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Erica Weiner 'Le Smoking' Earrings
description: These zipper pulls were most likely destined for one of Yves St Laurent's 1970s ready-to-wear creations.  For some reason, these little plaques were never attached to garments.  With caramel-colored enamel on brass that lets the YSL logo shine through, these rectangles measure 3/4" tall x 1/2" wide, and were obviously perfectly suited to be repurposed as earrings. Posts and backs are gold-filled. With YSL now re-branded as Saint Laurent Paris these are a piece of fashion history, get them while they last.

name: Erica Weiner Vintage Sequin Earrings
description:
These irregularly-shaped sequins were manufactured in France in the 1930s and were intended as ornaments for fine textiles. Each was hand-punched out of a thin sheet of metal and polished to a brilliant reflective shine, which has mellowed to a warm patina over the past century. Sequins measure about 1/4" in diameter and sit flat on the skin.  They're sturdy enough to stand up to years of everyday wear.  Brass sequins have gold-filled posts and backs, and silver-tone sequins have sterling silver posts and backs. All are attached to an antique cigarette trading card from the 1930s-40s, featuring the visage of a glamorous movie star.

Please bear in mind that these earrings are made from antique sequins so there are some inevitable signs of age, which, only add to their charm and character (see second photo). 

Handmade in New York City by Erica Weiner.

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Erica Weiner SALE Earrings: 'To Catch A Thief' & 'Santa Fe'
description:
TO CATCH A THIEF:These 3.8cm lengths of brass-based rhinestone have been oxidized to look vintage. The dark finish spreads to the foil backs of the rhinestones, mellowing them out with a smoky dull patina. The glass facets still catch the light and sparkle, but in a wonderful faded-glamour kind of way. (pic 1)

SANTA FE: A series of semi-precious stones, mined in Southwestern USA and traditionally used by American Indian craftsmen to create their signature silver jewelry, are the focal point of this collection of simple sterling silver earrings. Each earring measures about 3mm by 3mm, and features a polished gem snugly wrapped in sterling. Available: onyx. (pics 2 & 3)

Posts are surgical steel and earring backs are 14K gold-plated brass. Earrings come attached to cardstock printed with an "Erica Weiner Jewelry" logo.

Handmade in NYC.

(Photo courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Erica Weiner 'Filigree' Ring
description:
A tapered opening in the back makes this ring adjustable: it will bend to fit sizes 4 - 9. The scrolling openwork imitates delicate filigree, but this piece is sturdy enough to wear every single day. We recommend you remove it when you shower or wash your hands to avoid tarnishing. However, some people love a wear-darkened surface effect, especially on the brass version - you make the choice. Available in 3 finishes: 
Brass (pics 1, 4 & 5)
Pink Gold Plate (pics 2, 3 & 5) COMING SOON
14K Gold Plate (Pic 5, at back) SOLD OUT

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Erica Weiner 'Sadie Hawkins' Ring (silver)
description:
The leap year is historically a day of gender-role reversal: every four years a woman could propose marriage to a man. This commemorative ring is named after American comic strip character Sadie, whose bold personality inspired the 'Sadie Hawkins Dances' where girls invited boys to dance the night away! Sterling silver. 

(Photos courtesy of Erica Weiner)

name: Vintage Deadstock Name Bracelets
description:
These vintage name bracelets are deadstock from the USA. They come in either gold or silver-toned metal and some of the names available include: Carmen, Fabienne, Irene, Arlene, Donna, Pam, Janet, Doreen, Barbara or Holly. Since they are vintage you can't request your name so instead embrace their random hilarity and find your inner-Mindy.  

Bracelet circumference is about 7" (18cm), and each one opens and closes with a latch that hooks around the edge of the nameplate. (The size of each bracelet will vary slightly according to the length of the nameplate).

Available names and metal tones listed below.

Made in the USA.

name: Key Ring: Antique Skelton Key
description:
These antique keys from Belgium make great key rings. Three variations are available though each key is unique, some have longer barrels whilst others have numbers stamped on them … with age has comes a patina which only adds to their character.

Three variations are available: choose from the individual photos 2, 3 & 4 = options 1, 2 & 3.

name: Vintage Daisies: Brooch or Studs
description:
These white chrysanthemum daisy brooches or studs are vintage deadstock from Japan. They are beautifully detailed right down to the textured yellow centre. The daisy itself is an imitation carved ivory (i.e. plastic). I’m guessing they were manufactured sometime around the 1950s as the plastic is hard (similar to Bakelite) and due to its age can be brittle – so don’t drop it! 

BROOCH: The flower is 34mm in diameter with a height of 5mm. The brooch back is a gold tone metal. 

EARRINGS: 15mm diameter with a height of 5mm. Posts and backs are gold tone metal. 

Being ‘new old’ there are only a few available, so be quick.

name: Napoleonic Bee Brooch (Brass)
description:
Napoleon chose the bee as his emblem for their industrious & military-like efficiency. 

This lightweight yet detailed brass bee brooch spans 3.6cm x 2.88cm. Gold tone pin.

With age the brass will gain a lovely patina, but if you want to shiny things up, try dipping the bee in fresh lemon juice for a minute, rinse with cold water and pat dry with a clean cotton cloth.

name: Deco Style Drop Earrings
description: These beautiful deco-inspired light weight metal drop earrings come three tones: brass oxide (pics 2 & 3) copper oxide (pic 4) or silver oxide (pics 1 & 5). The oxide finish picks up the line detail and gives the earrings a genuine vintage look. 5cm long (exc hook) x 1cm wide.

name: We Dream in Colour 'Horse Head Bead' Bracelet
description:
Two options are available in these stunning bracket:

Option one features vintage white brass African beads which light up your wrist. Horse head hook closure cast in reclaimed metal. This bracelet is stunning. You won't be disappointed! 

Option 2: African translucent beads featured in these bracelets are handmade in Ghana from recycled glass bottles. Combined with vintage African brass beads and a horse head hook closure cast in reclaimed metal. Available in blue, green or purple. 

*The glass beads used in these bracelets are handmade by African artisans in small batches from ground glass bottles. So expect beautiful variations in shade, size & texture.

7.5" [19cm] long.

Handmade in the USA.

(Photo courtesy of We Dream in Colour)

name: We Dream in Colour 'Noemi' Bracelet
description:
Stack or stand alone, this shimmering shape is bound to please your wrist. Cast in reclaimed brass and studded with hand set crystal accents. Vintage brass chain and toggle closure.

Approximately 7.5" [19cm] around.

Photo courtesy of We Dream in Colour

name: We Dream in Colour 'Miette' Necklace
description:
This beautiful pendant features a glittering central disc with two reclaimed brass ornaments either side — each one different. A perfect companion for the 'Althea' earrings.

17" [43cm] long with a 2" [5cm] extender.

Handmade in USA.

(Photo courtesy of We Dream in Colour)

name: We Dream in Colour 'Deco' Earrings
description:
These Deco-inspired sparklers are cast in reclaimed brass and suspended from brass chain.  Gold dipped brass lever backs.

(Photo courtesy of We Dream in Colour)

name: We Dream in Colour 'Althea' Earrings
description:
These circular sparklers are cast in reclaimed brass and suspended from extra long gold dipped hooks for maximum glamour. 2cm diameter.

(Photo courtesy of We Dream in Colour)

name: We Dream in Colour 'Buckle Studs'
description:
These hand engraved brass buckle buttons were studded with sparkling antique cut steel studs in the late 1800s. Sterling posts have been added to create stellar little earrings.

5/8" [1.75cm] in diameter.

Cut steel was created as an alternative to diamonds. The small steel studs in these pieces were cut, faceted and pieced together by hand for an amazingly radiant result.

As these are steel please protect from exposure to excessive moisture (i.e. don't wear these to the beach or for a swim in the pool). Clean with a dab of oil on cotton or cloth to maintain polish.

Handmade in the USA.

(Photo courtesy of We Dream in Colour)

name: We Dream in Colour 'Turquoise Snake' Necklace
description:
A serpent with sparkling eyes slithers around a turquoise stone. Brass construction with glass stones. 

With a long history in jewelry, snakes were a symbol of royalty and deity in early Egyptian society where in Victorian jewelry an entwined snake symbolised infinity and eternal love.

17" [52cm] long with a 2" [5cm] extender.

Pendant and tassel are 4" [9cm] long.

Handmade in USA

(Photo courtesy of We Dream in Colour)

name: We Dream in Colour 'Demeter' Collar
description:
Leafy brass boughs with our hand worked verdigris connect gracefully to frame your neckline.

16.5" [42cm] total length.

Handmade in USA.

(Photo courtesy of We Dream in Colour)

name: We Dream in Colour 'Anjali' Necklace
description:
A trio of airy brass forms are linked by golden brass chain.

Brass. 43cm total length.

Handmade in USA.

(Photos courtesy of We Dream in Colour).

name: We Dream in Colour 'Naiad' Studs
description:
Detailed brass leaves are hand soldered to sterling silver posts and hand painted with WDIC's signature patina.

Sterling earring backs.
Leaf is 1/2" [1.3cm] in diameter.

*note earrings do not have the gloss finish of those pictured.

Handmade in USA.

(Photo courtesy of We Dream in Colour)

name: We Dream in Colour 'Jasmine' Studs
description:
Jasmine Studs: Delicate filigree blooms sit on sterling silver posts.  Brass. 0 .5" [1.75cm] total length. (pic 2)

Handmade in the USA.

(Photo courtesy of We Dream in Colour)

name: We Dream in Colour 'Savita' Earrings
description:
Light as air, star-like forms float from brass ear wires. Brass.
5cm long.

Handmade in USA.

(Photos courtesy of We Dream in Colour)

name: We Dream in Colour 'Maya' Earrings
description:
Airy blossoms woven from pure brass hang from brass ear wires.

5cm long.

Handmade in USA.

(Photos courtesy of We Dream in Colour)

name: We Dream in Colour 'Naija' & 'Naija Mini 'Earrings
description:
Lacy brass verdigris medallions hang from brass ear wires. 
 
NAIJA: 6.4cm long. 

NAIJA MINI: 4.5cm long.

Made in the USA.

(Photo courtesy of We Dream in Colour).

name: We Dream in Colour 'Priya' Earrings
description:
Airy fretwork of woven brass with a verdigris patina shivers from gold dipped brass wires.

5cm long.

name: Fragonard 'Aquarelle' & 'Porte Bonheur' Solid Perfume
description:
These tiny pots of solid perfume are perfect for traveling or just to  keep in your handbag. Available in 6 scents. 3g. Made in France.

AQUARELLE: 
Rose de mai (Rose)
Cerisier en fleurs (Cherry Blossom)
Fleur d'Oranger (Orange Blossom)
Citron (Lemon)
Freesia
Lavande (Lavender)

PORTE BONHEUR (GOOD LUCK):
HEART (Eau de Bonheur): Green fresh floral – bergamot, mandarin, jasmine on a background of sandalwood & cedar.
FLOWER (Diamant): Mandarin, cinnamon, rose, jasmine, helitrope & dark chocolate on a background of vanilla, patchouli & peru blossom. Smells amazing, a strong woody yet floral scent.
ELEPHANT (Juste un Baiser): mandarin, pear & violet, blackberry & strawberry on a background of vanilla, amber & musk. Very sweet, perfect for a young girl.
LADYBIRD (Belle de Nuit): A rich harmony of flowers and fruit on a velvety base of musk.
HORSHOE (Eau de Hongrie): Soft bergamot, jasmine notes  on a background of amber & citrus. A sharp, fresh cologne-like scent.
4 LEAF CLOVER (Concerto): Mandarin & bergamot, tea, amber & jasmine.

name: Fragonard 'Violette' (Violet) & 'Muguet' (Lily of the Valley) Eau de Toilette
description:
Violette is a lovely blend of flowers and fruit. A top note of orange and blackberry unveils a sumptuous violet middle note combined with rose and jasmine on a background of fruity raspberry musk.

'Muguet' celebrates the beautiful lily-of-the-valley. Featuring a top note of neroli and pink peppercorn. With a middle note of jasmine, freesia and lily-of-the-valley, on a spicy back note of amber, cedar and musk.

Made in France. Eau de Toilette, 50ml.

*as this was a limited edition scent only a few bottles remain in stock.

name: Fragonard 'Madamoiselle Amour' & 'Madamoiselle Paris' Gift Set
description:
This lovely gift set comprises of a 50ml bottle of either 'Madamoiselle Amour' or 'Madamoiselle Paris' & super cute pocket mirror within a laminated cotton make-up bag.

‘Madamoiselle Amour’ is an Eau de Toilette with notes of tangerine, strawberry, apple rose, jasmine, sweet pea and raspberry. (pic 2) 

'Madamoiselle Paris' is an Eau de Toilette with notes of neroli, mandarin, jasmine, magnolia, orange blossom, sandalwood, musk & peach. (pic 1)

Made in France. 50ml

name: L'ERBOLARIO 'Assenzio' (Absinthe) Range ($15-$72)
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals.

ASSENZIO (ABSINTHE): French artists of the 19th century claimed that the seductive fumes of the 'Green Fairy' enhanced their creativity. L'ERBOLARIO has harnessed the rich & fresh scent of artemisia absinthium in this lovely range.

SOAP (100g): A delicately perfumed soap that is suitable for sensitive skin.
BATH/SHOWER GEL (200ml): This invigorating gel can be used as a shower gel or bath foam. With vitamins A & E.
BODY CREAM (200ml): This light & fresh scented body cream will leave you skin velvety soft and deliciously perfumed, with safflower & sunflower oils & shea butter. Finish with EDP.
EAU DE PARFUM (100ml): An invigorating scent. The crispness of absinthe is highlighted with fresh notes of orange & lemon and spicy notes of coriander & cloves - the perfect final touch.

For a comprehensive description of this range see p. 52-53 of catalogue. See link under info column on right hand side of this page.

name: Fragonard 100ml EDT: Etoile, Eclat & Capucine
description:
Capucine: Gentle notes of green tea are joined by rose and jasmine on woody-musk base.

Eclat: A crisp floral scent featuring fresh Bergamot, Lemon and Freesia with warm heart notes of Frangipani & Gardenia on  base of sweet Marshmallow.

Etoile: A woody, floral scent with citrus accents. The notes feature Lemon, Apple, Bergamot, Ginger, Gardenia, Lily of the Valley, Jasmine, Cedar, Amber & Musk.

Emilie:  A soft floral scent that blends the sumptuous notes of Rose and Jasmine with delicate Violet, gentle Sandalwood & Amber.

Made in France. Eau De Toilette, 100ml

name: L'ERBOLARIO 'Citrus' Range (from $27 - $77)
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals.

CITRUS: Red Orange, Mandarin, Pink Grapefruit and Lemon and Lime Extracts combine to produce this fresh & uplifting fragrance. 

BATH/SHOWER GEL (200ml): This invigorating gel can be used as a shower gel or bath foam. With extracts of grapefruit, lemon, lime, mandarin & orange this gel is rich in bioflavonoids for a protective & toning action.
BODY CREAM (200ml): This light & fresh scented body cream will leave you skin velvety soft and deliciously perfumed. Finish with EDP.
EAU DE PARFUM (100ml): Sparkling & fresh - with notes of pink grapefruit, lime & yellow mandarin - the perfect final touch.
DIFFUSER: Citrus scents will make your home smell zesty fresh!

For a comprehensive description of this range see p. 56-57 of catalogue. See link under info column on right hand side of this page.

name: L'ERBOLARIO 'Green Tea' Range ($25-$59)
description:

GREEN TEA: A fresh and vital fragrance - green and sparkling with subtle notes of tea.

BATH/SHOWER GEL (200ml): This soft creamy foam can be used as a shower gel or bath foam. 
BODY CREAM (300ml): This rich perfumed fluid body cream will leave you skin velvety soft and deliciously perfumed. With Camellia Oil & Green Tea Extract, which has an antioxidant and protective action. Finish with EDP. CURRENTLY OUT OF STOCK
EAU DE PARFUM (50ml): This fresh fragrance is enriched with the antioxidant power of Green Tea Extract and Vitamin E - the perfect final touch.

For a comprehensive description of this range see p.64 of catalogue. See link under info column on right hand side of this page.

description:

SOAP (100g): Gently fragrant soap with jojoba oil.
BATH/SHOWER GEL (250ml): This gently scented gel can be used as a shower gel or bath foam. With mallow extract.
TALC (100g): Perfect after a bath or shower.
BODY CREAM (150ml): This rich scented body cream will leave you skin velvety soft and deliciously perfumed. Finish with EDP.
EAU DE PARFUM (50ml): The perfect final touch.

For a comprehensive description of this range see p. 66-67 of catalogue. See link under info column on right hand side of this page.

name: L'ERBOLARIO 'Liquid Amber' Range ($29-$77)
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals.

LIQUID AMBER (AMBRALIQUIDA): A fragrance of the Orient with notes of Honey, Spices and Amber. This rich scent will envelop the body as well as nourish and moisturise.

SOAP (100g): Pistachio oil gives this soap its softening & protective qualities whilst the extract of liquid amber adds a toning & astringent touch.
BATH/SHOWER GEL (250ml): This invigorating gel can be used as a shower gel or bath foam. Highly aromatic with Vitamin E.
BODY CREAM (250ml): This rich scented body cream will leave you skin velvety soft thanks to the addition of pistachio & sesame oils and deliciously perfumed with extract of liquid amber. Finish with EDP.
EAU DE PARFUM (100ml): The perfect final touch.
DIFFUSER: Rich & woody this diffuser will fill your home with the warm sensual smell of Amber.

For a comprehensive description of this range see p. 74-75 of catalogue. See link under info column on right hand side of this page.

name: L'ERBOLARIO 'Hedera' (Ivy) Range
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals.

Inspired by Ivy, 'Hedera' has green, refreshing notes that blend grapefruit leaves, ivy zest and lentisque (a green, resinous, woody scent). 

BATH & SHOWER GEL (300ml) 
BODY CREAM (200ml)
EAU DE PARFUM(100ml)
DIFFUSER (125ml)

description:

MÉHARÉES: Date & myrrh combine to create this warm and spicy scent. A range of products are available in this ever-popular fragrance:

BATH/SHOWER GEL (250ml): This invigorating gel can be used as a shower gel or bath foam.
SHOWER SHAMPOO (250ml): Perfect for travel or the gym - a shampoo for both the hair and the body. 
LIQUID TALC (150ml): This nourishing fluid will leave the skin soft & gently perfumed after a shower.
BODY CREAM (300ml): This rich scented body cream will leave you skin velvety soft and deliciously perfumed. Finish with EDP.
EAU DE PARFUM (50ml): The perfect final touch.

description:

NEROLI NEROLI: Neroli oil is made from the blossom of the bitter orange tree which gives the scent its distinctive Mediterranean & Middle Eastern edge. With sweet almond oil & Vitamin E.

SOAP (100g): Perfumed soap.
BATH/SHOWER GEL (250ml): This invigorating gel can be used as a shower gel or bath foam. Currently out of stock.
LIQUID TALC (150ml): This nourishing fluid will leave the skin soft & gently perfumed after a shower. With Sweet Almond Oil & Vitamin E. Currently out of stock.
BODY CREAM (250ml): This rich scented body cream will leave you skin velvety soft and deliciously perfumed. Finish with EDP.
EAU DE PARFUM (50 or 100ml): An invigorating scent - the perfect final touch.

BATH/SHOWER GEL (250ml): This gently scented foam can be used as a shower gel or bath foam. 
BODY CREAM (200ml): This rich scented body cream will leave you skin velvety soft and deliciously perfumed. With sweet almond oil, tea oil & camellia butter. Finish with EDP.
EAU DE PARFUM (100ml): A rich bouquet for the perfect final touch.
SOAP (100g):
DIFFUSER (125ml): The enchanting peony scent will make your home smell amazing.

BATH/SHOWER GEL (250ml): This invigorating gel can be used as a shower gel or bath foam.
BODY CREAM (200ml): This rich scented body cream will leave you skin velvety soft and deliciously perfumed. Finish with EDP.
EAU DE PARFUM (50ml): The perfect final touch.
HAND CREAM (75ml): For soft, delicately perfumed hands.

As '3 Rosa' is new to the range it is not include in the current catalogue. New catalogue coming soon.

description:

VANILLA & GINGER: This unusual combination is another L'ERBOLARIO classic. Rich & sweet vanilla is kept in check by ginger's spicy, citrus notes.

BATH/SHOWER GEL (250ml): This gently scented foam can be used as a shower gel or bath foam. With lotus extract.
EAU DE PARFUM (50ml): The perfect final touch.

description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals.

VIOLET: A new and immensely popular floral addition to the range.

BATH/SHOWER GEL (300ml): This gently perfumed gel can be used as a shower gel or bath foam.
BODY CREAM (200ml): This rich scented body cream will leave you skin velvety soft and deliciously perfumed.
HAND CREAM (75ml): For soft, delicately perfumed hands.

As 'Viola' is new to the range it is not include in the current catalogue. New catalogue coming soon.

name: L'ERBOLARIO 'White Tea' Range ($25-$75)
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals.

WHITE TEA: White Tea is a rare & precious crop that is apparently only harvested twice a year. This scent embodies that rarity - the gentle tea scent of white dragon pearls & silver needles is complimented by notes of white peony. 

BATH/SHOWER GEL (200ml): This creamy foam can be used as a shower gel or bath foam. 
BODY FLUID (200ml): This light & fresh perfumed fluid body cream will leave you skin velvety soft and deliciously perfumed. With bran, cotton & olive oils. Finish with EDP.
EAU DE PARFUM (100ml): A fresh, delicate & unique scent  - the perfect final touch.

For a comprehensive description of this range see p. 110-111 of catalogue. See link under info column on right hand side of this page.

name: L'ERBOLARIO 'Baobab' Range For Men ($29-$79)
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals.

BAOBAB: Refreshing and nourishing this range uses the majestic Baobab tree as its main ingredient and is available in a range of men's products:

SHOWER SHAMPOO (250ml):
SHAVING CREAM (150ml): A non-foaming, softening cream for delicate & sensitive skin.
FACE CREAM (50ml): Anti-aging moisturiser with Baobab Oil & Coffee Butter.
EAU DE PARFUM (100ml): Light & refreshing scent. Good for sensitive skin.

As 'Baobab' is new to the range it is not include in the current catalogue. New catalogue coming soon.

name: L'ERBOLARIO 'Felci' (Fern) Range FOR MEN ($27-$72)
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals.

FELCI (FERN): Refreshing and invigorating this gentle fragrance is available in a range of men's products:

SHOWER SHAMPOO (250ml): Perfect for travel or the gym - a shampoo for both the hair and the body. With extracts of Maidenhair.
SHAVING CREAM (150ml): A non-foaming, softening cream for delicate & sensitive skin.
AFTERSHAVE FLUID (100ml): A light & softening fluid designed to soothe the skin after shaving.
EAU DE PARFUM (100ml): This subtle, refreshing fragrance is perfect for everyday.
BODY CREAM (200ml):

For a comprehensive description of this range see p. 136-137 of catalogue. See link under info column on right hand side of this page.

name: L'ERBOLARIO 'Verde' Range For Men ($15-$29)
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals.

VERDE: Aptly entitled 'Green' this range of products conjures up scents of the forest with its lingering blend of fresh, herbal & woody notes.

SCRUB SOAP (200G): A gentle cleansing soap with rosemary needles and birch leaves.
BATH SHOWER GEL (250ML): Can be used as either a bath foam or shower gel. With extracts of birch & rosemary.
MINT SHAVING GEL (150ml): A gentle and refreshing shaving gel.

For a comprehensive description of the Verde range see p. 144-145 of catalogue. See link under info column at right hand side of this page.

name: L'Erbolario 'Imperial' Cologne (Colonia del Ponte)
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals.

IMPERIAL COLOGNE (110ml): This stand-alone cologne is one of L'ERBORLARIO's first products. It is a classic men's scent with notes of citrus, wild sage, artemisia, tarragon & lavender.

For a comprehensive description of Imperial Cologne (Colonia del Ponte) see p. 113 of catalogue. See link under info column at right hand side of this page.

name: L'ERBOLARIO 'The Children's Garden' ($24-$29)
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. 

All the products in 'The Children’s Garden' range have been formulated for the delicate and sensitive skin of new-born babies. Their ingredients have a maximum degree of purity and absolute quality. Strict clinical trials performed at the University of Pavia have ascertained the optimum skin tolerability of each individual product. Not tested on animals. Made in Italy. 

BATH FOAM: Soft & gently perfumed bath foam with rice & mallow.
BABY BATH & HAIR: Gentle cleansing for the skin and hair. With Apple and Mallow.
BABY PROTECTIVE CREAM: A thick cream rich in emollients with shea butter & mallow.
BABY SHAMPOO: Gently shampoo for babies & children with rice and mallow.

For a comprehensive description of this range see p. 149-150 of catalogue. See link under info column on right hand side of this page.

name: L'ERBOLARIO Fragrances for the Home
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals

L'ERBOLARIO'S range of room sprays come in an elegant but practical glass atomiser with a gas-free spray. Perfect for dealing with unpleasant odours instantly! A range of scents are available including:
MANDARIN & CASSIS, ORANGE & CARDAMON, CINNAMON & CLOVE
& WINTER SCENT (fresh, crisp, clean).

For a comprehensive description of this range see p. 172 of catalogue. See link under info column on right hand side of this page.

name: L'ERBOLARIO Lip Balm: 'Protective' or 'Nourishing'
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals.

NOURISHING LIP BALM (4.5ml): with four butters
PROTECTIVE LIP BALM (4.5ml): with olive & melaleuca

name: L'ERBOLARIO Hand Cream: 'Olive' or 'Lemon' ($22 -$28)
description:
L'ERBOLARIO combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern science to produce an incredible range of skincare, perfume lines for the body & fragrances for the home. Made in Italy. Not tested on animals.

L'ERBOLARIO hand creams are a staple of their range and all are among their best-selling products.

LEMON HAND CREAM (75ml): A fluid yet rich hand cream that absorbs immediately, and leaves the hands soft and ready to use!
OLIVE HAND & NAIL CREAM (75ml): Slightly thicker & richer than the Lemon, this Olive hand cream moisturisers both the hands and the nails. With olive oil & vitamin E.

For a comprehensive description of this range see p. 46 of catalogue. See link under info column on right hand side of this page.

* Hand creams also available in the '3 Rosa' & 'Violet' ranges.

name: Turkish Hand Towels (Bamboo)
description:
Turkey is famous for its luxury towelling. These super-soft oversized hand towels are made from100% bamboo and are available in either cream or white. Each towel has three woven sateen stripes at one end and two at the other, and finished with a stylish knotted fringe. Their very generous size also make these great towels for babies. Dimensions: 87cm x 49cm.

Made in Turkey.

name: Petit Kids 'Pirate Animals' Cushions
description:
These adorable petit rectangular cushions are made locally here in Melbourne from fabric sourced in the USA. To keep the postage reasonable only the covers are for sale. However, a size 14 square insert is perfect and makes for a nice puffy cushion.

PIRATES: Animals engaged in typical pirate ship activites adorn this cushion. Rich cream background with blues, reds, greens & yellows making up the design. This cushion is trimmed with red ric rac of which two variations are available, one has the ric rac inset 2.5cm from either side and the other has the ric rac sewn into the side seams.

Photos of both variations are pictured.
COVER ONLY	
Cover Dimensions: 35 x 29cm
100% cotton.

name: Thomaspaul 'Ornithology' Bathmat
description:
This bathmat from New York design-house Thomaspaul features a gorgeously detailed scientific illustration of bird - hence the Ornithology tag. It reminds me of those Gould League bird posters that adorned every Australian primary school classroom in the 1970s. Made from100% woven cotton and hand silk-screened, the bird is printed in slate against an off-white background. 
At such a generous size & heavy quality fabric this makes a great small rug.
92cm  x 61cm
Machine wash tumble dry low.
Made in India.

name: Thomaspaul Tea Towels: 'Koala', 'Pigeon', 'Octopus' & 'Wheel'
description:
SYDNEY (Koala): Thomaspaul’s ‘Sydney’ tea towel features that iconic Australian animal the koala. Part of the New York design-house’s ‘Souvenir’ range (and made exclusively for Australia), this fashionable yet functional tea towel features a tranquil grey koala silkscreened on 100% off-white cotton with mid-grey cotton binding. The perfect souvenir of Australia. 

WHEEL: Fashionably nautical this tea towel features a red ship’s wheel and horizontal navy stripes, silkscreened on an off-white cotton base with red cotton binding.
 
OCTOPUS: Featuring that majestic giant of the sea, the octopus, this tea towel depicts a graceful octopus silkscreened in chocolate brown on off-white cotton with chocolate brown cotton binding. 

Made in India.

name: Zzzooo Lights 'Mucca' Lamp
description:
Designed by Italian architect, Ramin Razani and made in Italy Zzzoolights are made from polypropylene sheet. They do not warm up, are low voltage and include an energy efficient warm white globe.

Available Designs: 
Cow (Mucca) L 23cm x W 15cm x H 27cm. LAST ONE

name: Zzzoo Lights: Mini Collection
description:
Designed by Italian architect, Ramin Razani and made in Italy Zzzoolights are made from polypropylene sheet. They do not warm up, are low voltage and contain a colour changing LED. Switch ON to automatically cycle through seven colours or double-clap to choose between the colours.

Dimensions approx: 14cm x 12.5cm.

Available in : Penguin & Fish designs 

NOTE: these lamps are 240v. Overseas buyers you may need an adaptor plug.

name: Muskhane Paper Garlands
description:
The paper for these garlands is handmade from the native Nepalese Lokta plant and dyed using natural dyes. These paper dots in rich colors, sewn together add a whimsical touch to any room.

New to the range this season are 2 multicoloured designs (Circles pic 2, Diamonds pics 3 & 4).

Approx. 1.8m long (each one  slightly). 

Diameter
Round: 6cm
Diamond: 4cm
Circles: 5.5

Note: To minimize postage costs Garlands will be posted via regular mail. 

(Photo courtesy of Muskhane)

name: Hand Knitted Woollen Scarves
description:
Hand knitted scarves, made exclusively for us in Melbourne using locally processed Australian wool! Super soft & snugly, generous length and playful tassel trim. 

Available in Black+Navy OR Stone+Pink

Length 2m (approx) + fringing 15cm

name: Daisy Dark Pajamas: Minkoff, Myrna & Chrystanthemum
description:
DAISY DARKS are a pair of pants and a tank in a beautiful, reusable cloth bag.  The slimcut hipster pants are designed for style and comfort and are flattering on many body shapes.

The pants are cut a little longer (because it looks good) and the longer length tank covers the hips and protects from chill.  The tank is discretely embroidered with the DAISY DARK "kitty" logo, and is made from a deliciously comfortable sheer black 100% cotton jersey.

The pants are designed and made in Melbourne from a soft lightweight 100% cotton.  The floral cuff is 100% Japanese cotton.  The tank is from American Apparel - made in Los Angeles, sweatshop labor free.

DAISY DARKS - perfect for sleep and lounging in, but also perfect out and about.

3 different cuffs available: 

'Minkoff' (pics 1 & 2) a floral cuff of vintage pinks, yellows, oranges, green on a black background. Red piping and waist string. Minkoff size 5 is sold out.

'Myrna' (pic 3) an abstract floral on a black background. Red piping and waist string. Myrna sizes 2 & 3 are sold out.

'Chrysanthemum' (pic 4) is the newest addition to the range. Featuring a stunning floral cuff made from 100% Japanese cotton. The rich blue tones of this season’s cuff are beautifully highlighted by royal blue trims.

Available in sizes 1-5

Please refer to our Sizing Chart page for sizing details.

name: La Cerise Sur Le Gateau 'Alice' Tote Bag
description: This season the lovely Alice adorns a canvas tote.

name: Rona Green Silkscreened 'Tiago' Bag (limited edition)
description:
‘Tiago’ by Melbourne artist Rona Green. Screen print on jute bag. Limited edition of 199. Dimensions: 40cm x 34cm x16cm (base). 

(First photo courtesy of Tara Moore at Through My Eyes).

name: Aya Kawa Cufflinks
description:
Aya Kawa cufflinks are designed in the Aya Kawa studio exclusively to compliment their range of silk ties and are made from enamel, brass, rhodium & stainless steel.  Each cufflink is a strictly limited edition.

CLEARANCE: ONLY A FEW PAIRS LEFT

Photo 1: Blue Floral (mid blue outer, turquiose blue centre with white floral detail)
Photo 2: Baby Blue Carousel (turquoise blue with white & silver floral detail)
Photo 3: Black & White Triple Flower
Photo 4: Dark Blue Carousel (very dark navy -almost black - with mid-blue floral detail)

name: Aya Kawa Ties: 'Vase', 'Mon' & 'Big Blue Flower'
description:
Beautiful handmade silk ties from South Australian-based textile designer Lynn Elzinga-Henry. CLEARANCE: LIMITED STOCK

BIG BLUE FLOWER: Stunning design. Royal blue floral against black background (pic 1)
VASE (Cream): Cream & Gold on White (pic 2)
VASE (Blue): Silver & Blue tones on Navy (pic 3)
VASE (Purple): Gold, Orange & Red on Purple (not for the faint-hearted!) (detail pic 4)
MON: Skinny tie. Navy with Purple medallion design (pic 5)

Beautifully presented in a black gift box.

150cm x 8-8.5cm

name: Gift Voucher
description:
Melody Nelson Gift Vouchers: Select amount from the drop down menu and your voucher will be posted directly to you for use INSTORE ONLY. 

Please phone or email the store if you require any variations to those offered, we'll do our best to accommodate you.

*If you would like the voucher sent to someone else, you can add a 'note to seller' whilst processing your paypal payment or email us and we'll make sure it's sent to the gift recipient.
